A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only saving grace of this film is the music score and cinematography.  Rian Johnson's script absolutely ruined every story arc created in the Force Awakens and soiled the legacy of Luke Skywalker in one masterful stroke of destruction.  His \"creative\" touches are akin to a paint brush soaked in diarrhea.  The fact that he has been given creative reign over the follow on trilogy should frighten Disney and StarWars fans everywhere.
